mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_attence where name=#{name} and date_format(attence_date,'%Y%m')=#{date}

select count(*) from tb_attence where name=#{name} and date_format(attence_date,'%Y%m')=#{date} and late_time is not null and is_vaild=1
